item.title: Bitcoin dips ahead of Fed Chair’s remarks at Jackson Hole
item.description: The world’s largest cryptocurrency is down almost 5% after notching an all-time high one week ago.

item.title: China’s DeepSeek quietly releases an open-source rival to GPT-5—optimized for Chinese chips and priced to undercut OpenAI
item.description: DeepSeek is forcing the U.S.–China AI rivalry into sharper focus and may put OpenAI on the backfoot following its disappointing GPT-5 launch

item.title: Bernie Sanders and Donald Trump form an unlikely alliance over billions in chipmaker subsidies
item.description: Trump has a newfound taste for state involvement in the private sector. It’s a palette Sanders has long enjoyed.
